channel.title: Posts on Thu Nguyen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Thu Nguyen

item.title: Secret sense of humour
item.description: I’ve come to realize the importance of a secret sense of humor as adults. Adult life is a non-stop comedy, filled with our self-contradictions, foolish looks, superficial thoughts - vulnerabilities that might feel too dangerous to expose to the society, yet wonderful to watch and laugh at. Taking yourself too seriously, you miss out on a great show üçø (and a chance to grow).

item.title: Welcome to my blog
item.description: Hi! Welcome to my blog. I started this blog to practice writing and share my thoughts with anyone who might be interested. For whatever reason, thank you for stumbling here. Hope you have a great time!
